Package com.pathfinder.racetrack.controller

Class OptionsMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.pathfinder.racetrack.view.OptionsMenuController
public class OptionsMenuController
extends Object
This class represents the logic of the options menu

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    OptionsMenuController()
    This constructor creates an option menu object which will be used for handling the setting of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • OptionsMenuController

      public OptionsMenuController()
      This constructor creates an option menu object which will be used for handling the setting of the game

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize method which the resources and handlers for the game

    • initTracks

      public void initTracks()
      This method gets all existing tracks and preselects a track per default

    • handleChangeTrack

      public void handleChangeTrack​(int direction)
      Handles the updates when the tracks get changes in the cover flow
      Parameters:
      direction - change value of the direction (right -1 or left +1)

    • handleSaveName

      protected void handleSaveName​(boolean focus, int playerIndex, String name)
      This handler saves a name which is typed in by the user and resets an error if no name is defined on any player
      Parameters:
      focus - Needs the focus variable value to check if the field is focused or not
      playerIndex - Needs the player index to know the name to be changed on which player
      name - Needs the new name of the player

    • handleSaveColor

      protected void handleSaveColor​(int playerIndex, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      This handler saves the color that the user has chosen for a specific players car
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Needs the index of the player of which the cars color should be changed
      color - Needs the new defined color

    • handleGameMode

      protected void handleGameMode()
      This handler checks which game mode is chosen by the user

    • handleStartGame

      protected void handleStartGame()
      This handler starts a new game

    • checkPlayers

      public boolean checkPlayers()
      This method checks if a name is typed in to a players name field
      Returns:
      Boolean if the check has passed

    • checkColor

      protected void checkColor​(int playerIndex)
      This method checks if the same color for a car is chosen twice
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Needs an index of a player of which the color should be checked

    • showError

      protected void showError​(int playerIndex, String errorMessage)
      This method shows an error on the corresponding players error field
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Needs a player index of which an error should be displayed
      errorMessage - Needs an error message which will be shown on the corresponding player

    • createGame

      protected void createGame()
      This method creates a new playing field and switches the scene to the playing field scene
